What are the treatments for Gerstmann-Straussler-Scheinker Disease ?,"There is no cure for GSS, nor are there any known treatments to slow progression of the disease. Current therapies are aimed at alleviating symptoms and making the patient as comfortable as possible.",NINDS,Gerstmann-Straussler-Sch
